price: (Yewe Muhamadi) bwira abagaragu banjye ko mu by’ukuri ndi Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
